column5: Beautiful cabin nestled in the woods on a private lake. Fully furnished with all the amenities of home. One bedroom downstairs and a loft upstairs. You'll never want to leave the peace and quiet. Fishing, First Monday Trades Day and much more to see and do.  Located 12 miles east of Canton, 10 miles west of Texas Rose Horse Park, we're in the heart of East Texas and the small towns that have BIG things happening....Edom, Ben Wheeler, and Lindale to name a few.
